title: join me for a night of plays
body:
my name is vascal. i would like a few friends to join me in some custom games. idc if you are salty or polite if you can play well please join me. 
anyone gold or higher is welcome. i mostly want this for fun and try something new. if you wish to join me. join my chat room and i will invit you to my game
chat room name is Vascal
